problem_text_cn: 如图,在菱形ABCD中,∠BAD=80°,AB的垂直平分线交对角线AC于点F,点E为垂足,连接DF,则∠CDF为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in the diamond ABCD, ∠BAD = N_0, the perpendicular bisector of AB intersects the diagonal AC at point F, point E is the foot of perpendicular, connected to DF, then ∠CDF is ()
raw_answer: 解:如图,连接BF,在△BCF和△DCF中,∵CD=CB,∠DCF=∠BCF,CF=CF∴△BCF≌△DCF∴∠CBF=∠CDF∵FE垂直平分AB,∠BAF=\frac{1}{2}×80°=40°∴∠ABF=∠BAF=40°∵∠ABC=180°-80°=100°,∠CBF=100°-40°=60°∴∠CDF=60°．故选:D．
raw_comment: 本题考查全等三角形的判定条件,菱形的性质,垂直平分线的性质．
